status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.section: Infecting Cells with SeV or RSV in A549 or LLCMK2 cells
steps.step:
{"blocks":[{"key":"869c5","text":"Infecting cells with SeV or RSV in A549 or LLCMK2 cells

1. Prepare a virus dilution in infection media with the correct virus-specific media (see materials section for media composition).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fhrhs","text":"Calculate the volume of virus needed (X) using the MOI formula: ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cscoh","text":"     (MOI*cell number)/Virus titer = X","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3qk9v","text":"The amount of infection media used to prepare the virus will depend on the size of the well or plate used - it is best to use the minimal volume needed to cover the well/plate to help ensure virus particle attachment to cells ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fh79h","text":"2. Remove TCM
3. Wash cells twice with 1X PBS
4. Add XµL of virus suspended in infection media to each well (calculated in step 1)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fjcvc","text":"5. Incubate the plate for 1 hr @ 37°C, rocking the plate/flask every 15 minutes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ar2tc","text":"6. Remove the media ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7r86g","text":"7. Wash twice with 1X PBS
8. Add infection media to each well/flask ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ast42","text":"For SeV infection: add SeV-Infection media, for SeV infection in LLCMK2 cells: add TRYPSIN –TPCK to the infection media for a final concentration of 2µg/mL TRYPSIN –TPCK","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hqdf","text":"For RSV infection: add RSV-Infection media (2%FBS)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfipe","text":"9. Place the plate/flask back in a 37ºC, 5% CO2 incubator","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":46,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dhnet","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
